instance.context:
The agency is administered by the United States
Secretary of Energy , and its headquarters are located in Southwest Washington , D.C. , on Independence Avenue in the James V. Forrestal Building , named for James Forrestal , as well as in Germantown , Maryland . In 1942 , during World War II , the United States started the Manhattan Project , a project to develop the atomic bomb , under the eye of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers . After the war in 1946 , the Atomic Energy Commission ( AEC ) was created to control the future of the project .

Europeans often laugh at American
energy ;

energy ;

he plays tennis with great
energy ;

the DOE is responsible for maintaining the
energy policy ;
